pr_title: GH-1867 pass parserconfig to protocol session

timeline.message: GH-1867 pass parserconfig to protocol session

timeline.bodyText: Haven’t seen this part of mockito. This tests that the setParserConfig method has been called exactly once with config?
timeline.author: hmottestad

replies.bodyText: That's exactly right! The client is a mock, and we use verify to check that a particular method with a particular argument has been called on that mock.
replies.author: jeenbroekstra
